input.prompt:
Extract all guidance about:
1. How to set up and maintain a private fork
2. Backup procedures before upgrades
3. How to handle MEMORY directory
4. Git workflow recommendations
5. Any warnings or best practices mentioned

input.command: cd ~/.claude && git remote -v 2>/dev/null && echo "---" && git status --short 2>/dev/null | head -30 && echo "---" && echo "Total uncommitted:" && git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l
input.description: Check git remote and uncommitted changes in ~/.claude
Check MEMORY directory size and contents
